Summary: 11 small craft going west to east then north turn followed by big craft
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Burlington

divs: sighting detailsi was leaving huffs gas station at the corner i85\40 and hwy 49 in burlington nc i saw what i counted to be 11small craft pulsing red orange moving west to east then changing direction to due north then vanishing followed by a larger craft that followed the same path there was no sound that i could here and they seem to go at a paced speed
